list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment:
Update version to 2.1.7 and changelog
Incremented version to 2.1.7 in `manifest.json`. Updated changelog.html with the latest changes to layout and usability, filter icon color, and selected item handling.

task.summary: Default task
new extension
download audio and video
change media type
audio and video name
add posters to videos
change tables to grid layout

Add background and content script bundles
This commit includes the addition of the compiled background and content script bundles to the dist directory. The background script handles various browser events and updates, while the content script contains functions for extracting and processing media elements from web pages.

Update media selection and download handling
Enhanced media selection logic and updated event handling for media items in the downloader. Added functionality for individual item downloads and improved checkbox state management to reflect correct selection status.

Remove unused functions and fix code formatting
Deleted unused utility functions `_dispatchEvent` and `hasClass` from `utils.ts` and `dom-functions.ts`. Corrected a formatting issue in `main.ts` for better code readability and maintainability.

Refactor event listeners and use utility functions
Replaced direct Chrome API calls with utility functions for various browser events, improving code organization and readability. Simplified logic for handling tab updates, activations, and installations by using consistent callback methods from `chrome-api.ts`.

Add YouTube download restriction handling
Introduced `isRestrictedUrl` utility function and updated logic to handle YouTube download restrictions. Added relevant CSS and HTML updates to display a notification when such restrictions are detected.

Refactor accordion and media download functionality
Simplified accordion-toggling logic and improved CSS for accordion-item activation. Refactored media download handling by removing redundant code and enhancing header-body structure alignment.

Refactor media handling and messaging
Removed redundant VideoItem type and replaced with MediaItem. Updated naming conventions for media types and integrated UUID for elements. Enhanced media messaging structure to streamline data handling and avoid errors.

Refactor media handling and messaging
Removed redundant MediaItem type and replaced it with MediaItem. Updated naming conventions for media types and integrated UUID for elements. Enhanced media messaging structure to streamline data handling and avoid errors.

Remove chrome casting definitions
Deleted `chrome-cast-index.d.ts` which contained type definitions for Google Cast API. This file was redundant and potentially causing conflicts with other type declarations, simplifying type management across the project.

Refactor storage and update version handling
Updated storage handling functions and added a utility for retrieving the extension version. Refactored form submission logic to improve code organization and maintainability.

Refactor media retrieval and messaging logic
Implemented separate modules for media retrieval, messaging listeners, and DOM event handling. Introduced a new utility function for tab information retrieval and refactored existing main logic for improved code clarity and separation of concerns.

Update version to 2.0.4 and changelog
Incremented version to 2.0.4 in manifest.json. Updated changelog.html to reflect fixed minor bugs in the new release. Adjusted workspace.xml to include relevant changes and tasks.

Update downloader and media scripts for compatibility
Fixed issues with media downloading functions and enhanced compatibility with updated Chrome security policies. Added more robust error handling within downloader scripts to ensure smoother operation.

Update downloader and media scripts for compatibility
Fixed issues with media downloading functions and enhanced compatibility with updated Chrome security policies. Added more robust error handling within downloader scripts to ensure smoother operation.

Update downloader and media scripts for compatibility
Fixed issues with media downloading functions and enhanced compatibility with updated Chrome security policies. Added more robust error handling within downloader scripts to ensure smoother operation.

Update downloader and media scripts for compatibility
Fixed issues with media downloading functions and enhanced compatibility with updated Chrome security policies. Added more robust error handling within downloader scripts to ensure smoother operation.

Add top-container CSS for sticky headers
Extracted top-container styles from main.css to a new file top-container.css for better modularity. Updated main.css to import the new top-container.css for maintaining code organization and readability.

Import grid.css in accordion-body.css
Moved grid.css import from main.css to accordion-body.css to ensure proper styling. This helps in maintaining modularity and ensuring each component imports only its necessary styles.

Add thumbnail.css and update grid.css
Separated thumbnail-specific styles into a new thumbnail.css file. Updated grid.css to import thumbnail.css, enhancing modularity and maintainability of the CSS.

Enhance media data extraction and sending logic
Refactor media data extraction to include dimensions, quality, and duration for images, videos, and audios. Introduce a sendMedia function for unified message handling. Adjust mappers-fn.ts to support new media properties.

Remove dual-range slider component
Eliminate unused dual-range slider web component from `downloader.html` and the project. This cleanup enhances maintainability by removing redundant code and dependencies.

Refactor media filters and update version to 2.1.0
Simplify and enhance filtering options for media types by reorganizing the HTML structure and adding chips for better user interaction. Additionally, implement filter data storage and retrieval, and

Refactor media filters and update version to 2.1.0
Simplify and enhance filtering options for media types by reorganizing the CSS structure and adding chips for better user interaction. Additionally, improve maintainability by splitting CSS files and updating paths accordingly.

Refactor media handling and improve filtering logic
Consolidate media types and streamline processing methods, removing obsolete code. Enhance CSS for filter chips and other UI elements for better consistency and user experience.

Refactor accordion CSS for improved layout and consistency
Updated the accordion-header and accordion-body styles for better padding and border management. Removed redundant border styling from the accordion-item, simplifying the CSS and ensuring a more consistent UI appearance.

Refactor media extraction and handling
Refactored media extraction functions to synchronous operations for simplicity. Updated media mapping functions to handle asynchronous file type detection.

Add theme change message handling
Added a new message event type `THEME_CHANGED` and updated the options save function to send this message after changing the theme. This facilitates theme updates across different parts of the extension in real-time.

Refactor media mapping and downloading functionality
Consolidated and relocated mapper functions for better code organization. Enhanced media downloading capabilities, and removed unused `changelog.html` and related CSS elements. Improved consistency and reduced redundant code.

Refactor media mapping and sending logic
Consolidated media mapping functions for better organization and efficiency. Simplified sendMedia function and removed redundant tab parameter. Introduced jobHash for more reliable media processing.

Refactor media mapping and sending logic
Consolidated media mapping functions for better organization and efficiency. Simplified sendMedia function and removed redundant tab parameter. Introduced jobHash for more reliable media processing.

Simplify media processing and rendering logic
Streamlined media mapping functions for better efficiency and clarity. Implemented new accordion structure for better user interaction and visual organization. Added duration and quality properties to video elements to improve metadata handling.

Simplify media processing and rendering logic
Streamlined media mapping functions for better efficiency and clarity. Implemented a new accordion structure for improved user interaction and visual organization. Added duration and quality properties to video elements to enhance metadata handling.

Simplify media processing and rendering logic
Streamlined media mapping functions for better efficiency and clarity. Implemented a new accordion structure for improved user interaction and visual organization. Added duration and quality properties to video elements to enhance metadata handling.

Activate filters icon on changes
Updated CSS to apply active color to filters icon when filters are active. Added logic to update the icon state based on filter changes, improving user feedback and interaction clarity.

Make accordion headers sticky
Enhanced the user experience by making accordion headers sticky as the user scrolls. This ensures that headers remain visible for better navigation. Also, removed the overflow property from accordion items and introduced a new CSS variable for top container height.

Remove unused functions and update DOM height handling
Eliminated the `changeToggleAllCheckbox` function and streamlined selection handling in `onClickItem`. Introduced `setTopContainerHeightVar` to dynamically manage the top container height, improving layout consistency.

Remove unused functions and update DOM height handling
Eliminated the `changeToggleAllCheckbox` function and streamlined selection handling in `onClickItem`. Introduced `setTopContainerHeightVar` to dynamically manage the top container height, improving layout consistency.

Fix top container height calculation delay
Added a timeout delay to the `setTopContainerHeightVar` function to ensure the DOM is fully loaded before calculating the height, improving layout consistency.

Fix top container height calculation delay
Added a timeout parameter to the `setTopContainerHeightVar` function to ensure the DOM is fully loaded before calculating the height, improving layout consistency. This provides a more flexible approach by allowing custom delay values.

Update media display filtering and selected count handling
Passed an additional type parameter to `getAllMediaToDisplay` for accurate media filtering. Consolidated and improved selected count updates by simplifying function calls and adding a new helper function.

Update version to 2.1.7 and changelog
Incremented version to 2.1.7 in `manifest.json`. Updated changelog.html with the latest changes to layout and usability, filter icon color, and selected item handling.

Refactor media filters and update version to 2.1.0
Simplify and enhance filtering options for media types by reorganizing the HTML structure and adding chips for better user interaction. Additionally, implement filter data storage and fix some minor issues in `send-media-listener.ts`.

Refactor media filters and update version to 2.1.0
Simplify and enhance filtering options for media types by reorganizing the CSS structure and adding chips for better user interaction. Additionally, improve maintainability by splitting CSS files and updating paths accordingly.

Refactor media handling and improve filtering logic
Consolidate media types and streamline processing methods, removing obsolete code. Enhance CSS for filter chips and other UI elements for better consistency and user experience.

Refactor accordion CSS for improved layout and consistency
Updated the accordion-header and accordion-body styles for better padding and border management. Removed redundant border styling from the accordion-item, simplifying the CSS and ensuring a more consistent UI appearance.

Remove send_media script bundle
Deleted `send_media.bundle.js` and its source map from the distribution folder. This cleanup helps in maintaining code quality and reducing unnecessary files.

Refactor media extraction and handling
Refactored media extraction functions to synchronous operations for simplicity. Updated media mapping functions to handle asynchronous file type detection.

Add theme change message handling
Added a new message event type `THEME_CHANGED` and updated the options save function to send this message after changing the theme. This facilitates theme updates across different parts of the extension in real-time.

Delete changelog view and mapper functions
Removed `changelog.html` and associated CSS. Migrated mapper functions to a new file to organize code better. This streamlined the media handling and downloading functionalities in the project.

Refactor media mapping and downloading functionality
Consolidated and relocated mapper functions for better code organization. Enhanced media downloading capabilities, and removed unused `changelog.html` and related CSS elements. Improved consistency and reduced redundant code.

Make accordion headers sticky
Enhanced the user experience by making accordion headers sticky as the user scrolls. This ensures that headers remain visible for better navigation. Also, removed the overflow property from accordion items and introduced a new CSS variable for top container height.

Remove unused functions and update DOM height handling
Eliminated the `changeToggleAllCheckbox` function and streamlined selection handling in `onClickItem`. Introduced `setTopContainerHeightVar` to dynamically manage the top container height, improving layout consistency.

Fix top container height calculation delay
Added a timeout delay to the `setTopContainerHeightVar` function to ensure the DOM is fully loaded before calculating the height, improving layout consistency.

Added a timeout parameter to the `setTopContainerHeightVar` function to ensure the DOM is fully loaded before calculating the height, improving layout consistency. This provides a more flexible approach by allowing custom delay values.

Update media display filtering and selected count handling
Passed an additional type parameter to `getAllMediaToDisplay` for accurate media filtering. Consolidated and improved selected count updates by simplifying function calls and adding a new helper function.
